item.title: Use The DOGE Playbook To Expose The Corporate Activism Destroying America
item.description: American corporations and their government regulators serve radical left-wing interests rather than the common good.

item.title: For America’s 250th Celebration, Bring Back The American Freedom Train
item.description: For America's bicentennial, a train loaded with historical artifacts was visited by 7 million Americans — it's time to board the Freedom Train again.

item.title: Trump’s Whole-Of-Government Approach To MAHA Is The Holistic Health Strategy We Need
item.description: A holistic approach to solving the country’s chronic disease epidemic is the only way to reverse it.

item.title: Trump Designating Cartels Terrorists Isn’t ‘Worrisome’ To Lawful U.S. Gun Manufacturers
item.description: The assertion that U.S. firearm manufacturers 'sell arms to criminals' is a flat-out lie.
